transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, Pal sahab, good morning. Himanshu baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Haan ji, haan sir, haan ji, haan. Keh rahe hai ki abhi na apne matlab jo hai meri jo ek team se na call aap video meeting karwa raha hu sir. Renu call karegi aap call receive kar lijiyega aur.
Customer: Haan ji, ek minute kar dena yaar tennu matlab ki woh bhej de hor tennu main karda back call tennu.
Executive: Awaaz kat rahi hai. Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Hello. Haan ji sir, haan ji, haan. Hun dasso ji.
Executive: Toh main aapko call karwa raha hu aur ek video meeting kar lete hai. Renu call karegi aapko, theek hai?
Customer: Sir, aap karoge ji?
Executive: Nahi, hamari jo aur bhi matlab higher authority team hai unse call karwa raha hu aapko.
Customer: Theek hai. Sir, jo pehle karate hai unse jo unse bhi higher hai ji?
Executive: Nahi, nahi, jo pehle kiya tha unse nahi. Kisi aur se karwa raha hu main. Unko sara concern bata diya hai. Sara kuch theek hai. Toh ek baar woh apne level pe check karke aapko aapki jo bhi cheeze hai woh sara hum unko explain kar diya humne. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai ji, theek hai, theek hai. Okay, abhi, abhi link bhej rahe ho?
Executive: Haan, link bhej rahe hai. Haan ji, haan hai. Theek, theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to receive a back call.

- Customer asks who will be calling.



Resolution:

- Executive said Renu will call for video meeting.

- Executive informed a higher authority team will call.

- Executive said concerns were shared with the team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, call, higher authority
